name: ACE AMERICAN INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellant v. UNDERWRITERS AT LLOYDS AND COMPANIES, Columbia Casualty Company and Gulf Underwriters Insurance Company, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Ace American Insurance v. Underwriters at Lloyds & Companies

judges: BEFORE: CASTILLE, C.J., and SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, TODD, MCCAFFERY and GREENSPAN, JJ.
parties: ACE AMERICAN INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellant v. UNDERWRITERS AT LLOYDS AND COMPANIES, Columbia Casualty Company and Gulf Underwriters Insurance Company, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Order of the Superior Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
971 A.2d 1121
ACE AMERICAN INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellant v. UNDERWRITERS AT LLOYDS AND COMPANIES, Columbia Casualty Company and Gulf Underwriters Insurance Company, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 14, 2009.
Decided April 29, 2009.
Eleanor Morris Illoway, Esq., John G. Harkins, Jr., Esq., Harkins Cunningham, L.L.P., Philadelphia, for ACE American Insurance Company.
